channel.title: Can anybody help....:(
channel.description:
can't anyone help?
i have a weird error while compiling and i've reinstalled jdk about 5 times... Sad heres the error
[code] javac: file not found : *.java usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for list of possible options[/code]
i already used evryy jdk over 6....

item.title: Can anybody help....:(
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Make sure your compiler is in the same file and folder and your server files like client.java server.java etc. What your compiler is trying ot say is it cannot find what you want to compile.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anybody help....:(
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

type help in then tell me what it says.
